title: Jason Lizzy and the Snowman Village
description: After Jason and Lizzyâ€™s family move hundreds of miles south from Chicago to Texas, leaving behind friends, school and the only home they've ever known, they are desperate for something familiar. Together, Jason and Lizzy make a late-night wish upon a star for snow that launches them on an incredible adventure even bigger than their recent cross-country move.Join Jason and Lizzy as they make new friends, visit far-away lands, and learn, sometimes, home is more than where you live.
author: Charity Marie
